mapper.select: SELECT u.id as user_id, u.username, r.id as role_id, r.role_name, m.id as menu_id, m.menu_name, m.url, m.permission, u.create_time, u.update_time FROM user_info u LEFT JOIN user_role_rel urr ON u.id = urr.user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON urr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_menu_rel rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.sort ASC
